Key Match Events: Juan Soto hit a go-ahead two-run home run in the 11th inning
Post-Match Reflections: Juan Soto expressed relief after his home run
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jazz Chisholm Jr. delivered the final blow with a walk-off hit
Others: The Yankees capitalized on the Baltimore Orioles' loss to take a 1.5-game lead in the American League East
